summary: An Ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment into court of the judgments rendered in the condemnation of certain portions of Blocks 5 and 7, King County Addition to the City of Seattle, for park purposes, under Ordinance No. 45196 (as amended); making an appropriation of Twenty-one Thousand Six Hundred ($21,600.00) Dollars from the General Fund therefor, and, a sufficient amount for such purpose not having been provided or specified in any tax levy or official estimate, declaring the emergency making necessary such increased appropriation.
